snippet: New releases also include a debut album from Heads of State, consisting of Gary Bartz, Larry Willis, Buster Williams and Al Foster; and “Dark Lights Up” from the singer-songwriter Eleni Mandell.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews latest albums by jazz-rock trio Gard Nilssen's Acoustic Unity, jazz group Heads of State, singer-songwriter Eleni Mandell and improv-chamber group Waxwing.
lead_paragraph: New releases also include a debut album from Heads of State, consisting of Gary Bartz, Larry Willis, Buster Williams and Al Foster; and “Dark Lights Up” from the singer-songwriter Eleni Mandell.

headline.main: The Drummer Gard Nilssen and the Trio Waxwing Release New Albums
headline.print_headline: An Unplugged Sound and Jazz Veterans’ Collective Soul
